name: Just Let Me Play Mahjongg!
description:
Tired of Mahjongg games with additional cash-shops, obtrusive music, limited attempts, and weirdly bad performance? Same! This is why we have made Just Let Me Play Mahjongg! – a simple & free Mahjongg with no strings attached. Start up, tune in, delete stones.

Slightly fancy stuff that we have included:

• A high-score system that rewards smart play

• A cool color-scheme inspired by Sanzo Wada

• An editor for your own layouts

• Support for standard layout-formats

• A bunch of levels courtesy by ourselves

• Open structure, easy to mod

• Minimal GUI-mode

• The source-code

Enjoy!
